p: Colitis was induced by intrarectal administration of 2 mL of diluted acetic acid solution (4%) in rats. Colitis was induced on the first day, and treatments started 2 h after colitis induction and continued for five days. Thymol was administered at doses of 10, 30 or 100 mg/kg p.o. per day. Macroscopic and histopathological investigations were performed [ 110].
